name: Football Manager Touch 2017 Starting from the Bottom Challenge
detailed_description: Your team has been relegated to the bottom tier. With a squad full of unhappy players and under strict demands from the board, your task is to ensure promotion by going unbeaten in the league.
about_the_game: Your team has been relegated to the bottom tier. With a squad full of unhappy players and under strict demands from the board, your task is to ensure promotion by going unbeaten in the league.
short_description: Your team has been relegated to the bottom tier. With a squad full of unhappy players and under strict demands from the board, your task is to ensure promotion by going unbeaten in the league.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (SP2), 7 (SP1), 8, 8.1, 10 (1607) – 64-bit or 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X3100, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.5, 10.8.5, 10.9.5, 10.10.5, 10.11.6, 10.12 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X3100, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
